item.title: 奇货可居：克里希纳-梅马尼（Krishna Memani）谈多元化之争（播客
item.description: 我们一次又一次地被告知，投资中的 "免费午餐 "就是分散投资，只需投资于更广泛的资产，就能长期提高收益。这是教科书式的现代金融。然而在过去几年里，情况并非如此。投资者只需投资美股，就能获得丰厚的回报（偶尔也会有小挫折）。更重要的是，即使在美股中，投资者也应该集中投资大型科技股。做多美国科技股一直是理想选择【原文：We’re told over and over again that the one “free lunch” in investing is diversification, and that you can improve your returns over time simply by investing in a wider range of assets. This is textbook modern finance. And yet over the past several years this hasn’t been the case. An investor would have done great (with the occasional hiccups) just by investing in US stocks. item.title: 法国农业信贷银行十年后重推浮动武士债券
item.description: 法国农业信贷银行（Credit Agricole SA）约十年来首次发行浮动利率武士债券，吸引了担心日本政府债券收益率上升的投资者的强烈需求。【原文：Credit Agricole SA is issuing floating-rate Samurai bonds for the first time in about a decade, as it draws strong demand from investors worried about rising Japanese government bond yields.】

item.title: 供应前景趋紧，欧洲天然气月度涨幅可期
item.description: 欧洲天然气价格自 1 月份以来首次出现月度上涨，原因是地缘政治的一系列发展以及市场趋紧的迹象。【原文：European natural gas prices are headed for their first monthly advance since January amid a flurry of geopolitical developments and signs of a tighter market.】

item.title: 欧洲股市将创一月以来最大单月涨幅
item.description: 由于投资者关注全球贸易前景，欧洲股市将创下 1 月份以来的最大单月涨幅。【原文：European stocks were set for the biggest monthly gain since January, as investors monitored the outlook for global trade.】

item.title: 桑坦德银行取代巴克莱银行成为欧洲最大的特别提款权债券发行商
item.description: 根据 S&P 全球评级公司（S&P Global Ratings）的数据，桑坦德银行（Banco Santander SA）超过巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc），成为欧洲最大的重大风险转移发行商。【原文：Banco Santander SA surpassed Barclays Plc as Europe’s largest issuer of significant risk transfers, according to S&P Global Ratings.】

item.title: 土耳其第一季度经济增长低于预期
item.description: 尽管出现了短暂的降息，土耳其第一季度的经济增长仍低于预期。【原文：Turkey’s economy expanded less than projected in the first quarter despite a brief period of interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 西班牙通胀降温超预期，为欧洲央行减息提供支持
item.description: 西班牙通胀率略低于欧洲央行 2% 的目标，为下周再次降息提供了支持。【原文：Spanish inflation eased to just below the European Central Bank’s 2% target, backing the case for interest rates to be lowered again next week.】

item.title: 贝莱德比特币 ETF 在五月反弹期间吸引创纪录的资金流入
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc. ）的iShares比特币信托基金在5月份创下了有史以来最大的月度资金流入量，因为这种原始的加密货币攀升至创纪录的水平，同时被更多的支持者吹捧为一种替代性的价值储存手段。【原文：BlackRock Inc.’s iShares Bitcoin Trust posted its largest-ever monthly inflow in May, as the original cryptocurrency climbed to a record while being touted by more proponents as an alternative store of value.】

item.title: 投资拖累瑞典经济意外萎缩
item.description: 瑞典的产出在年初意外收缩，打破了连续两个季度的增长势头，主要原因是投资低迷。【原文：Swedish output unexpectedly contracted at the beginning the year, breaking a two-quarter streak of expansion due mainly to subdued investments.】

item.title: 印度 PE 公司 Multiples 从汇丰银行和野村获得私人债务
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度私募股权公司 Multiples Alternative Asset Management 已获得约 50 亿卢比（约合 5850 万美元）的私人信贷，以支持其收购数字产品工程平台 QBurst Software Services 的控股权。【原文：Indian private equity firm Multiples Alternative Asset Management has gotten about 5 billion rupees ($58.5 million) of private credit to back its acquisition of a controlling stake in digital product engineering platform QBurst Software Services, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 印度瑜伽大师的公司面临财务交易审查
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度政府已要求著名瑜伽大师巴巴-拉姆德夫（Baba Ramdev）共同创办的传统医药公司帕坦伽利阿育吠陀有限公司（Patanjali Ayurved Ltd.）解释一些被认为可疑的交易。【原文：India’s government has asked Patanjali Ayurved Ltd., a traditional medicine company co-founded by celebrity yoga guru Baba Ramdev, to explain some transactions deemed suspicious, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市将上涨，英镑跌回 1.35 美元下方
新世界寻求更多银行加入 20 亿美元贷款计划
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，新世界发展有限公司（New World Development Co., Ltd.）正在寻找更多的银行加入以其主要资产维多利亚港湾（Victoria Dockside）为抵押的高达156亿港元（20亿美元）的贷款，因为这家资金短缺的公司正试图支撑其财务状况。【原文：New World Development Co. is looking for more banks to join an up to HK$15.6 billion ($2 billion) loan backed by its key asset, Victoria Dockside, according to people familiar with the matter, as the cash-strapped company tries to shore up its finances.】

item.title: 肯尼亚通胀率保持在 5%以下，创 15 年最长纪录
item.description: 肯尼亚的年通胀率已连续 12 个月低于央行目标区间 5%的中点，这是至少自 2010 年以来最长的一段时期，从而加强了再次降息的理由。【原文：Kenyan annual inflation remained below the 5% midpoint of the central bank’s target range for a 12th straight month, the longest stretch since at least 2010, strengthening the case for another interest-rate cut.】

item.title: 马克龙向东南亚示好，法国与新加坡签署协议
item.description: 法国和新加坡在埃马纽埃尔-马克龙总统访问新加坡期间签署了一项范围广泛的协议，以加强核能和清洁能源合作。【原文：France and Singapore signed a wide-ranging deal to enhance nuclear power and clean energy cooperation during President Emmanuel Macron’s visit to the city-state.】

item.title: 新日铁计划投资 60 亿美元建设日本钢厂
item.description: 卷入收购美国钢铁公司长期争夺战的日本新日铁公司（Nippon Steel Corp.【原文：Nippon Steel Corp., the Japanese company embroiled in lengthy battle to buy US Steel Corp., said it plans to spend 869 billion yen ($6 billion) at home to expand output from cleaner furnaces.】

item.title: 如果法庭之争失败，特朗普的关税选择会更慢、更复杂
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统的政府坚称，无论以何种方式，他的关税政策都不会改变。【原文：President Donald Trump’s administration insists his tariffs are here to stay, one way or another.】

item.title: 韩国养老金加大海外投资，迎战 "卖美 "风潮
item.description: 韩国最大的养老基金计划购买更多的外国股票，而此时特朗普政府的关税议程所推动的 "抛售美国 "趋势正开始占据上风。【原文：South Korea’s largest pension fund plans to buy more foreign stocks, just as a “sell America” trend fueled by the Trump administration’s tariff agenda begins to take hold.】

item.title: 韩国股市再创新高，获利者在芯片之外实现多元化
item.description: 创下 52 周新高的韩国股票比近年来任何时候都要多，这反映了企业改革的希望和市场涨幅的多样化，而不仅仅是半导体重量级股票。【原文：More South Korean stocks are hitting their 52-week high than at any other point in recent years, reflecting hopes for corporate reform and diversification in the market’s gainers beyond semiconductor heavyweights.】

item.title: 管理者称，日本放弃回购可能会带来长期利益
item.description: 据报道，日本政府某部门建议企业将闲置现金用于投资，而不是回购股票。【原文：A reported recommendation from a Japanese government ministry that companies use spare cash for investment instead of buying back stock would benefit long-term investors, according to asset managers.】

item.title: Jump India 据称将聘请来自 IMC 的阿赫塔尔担任最高技术职务
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，全球做市商 Jump Trading 在印度的分支机构 Jump India 已聘请 Javed Akhtar 领导其技术部门。【原文：Jump India, the local arm of global market maker Jump Trading, has hired Javed Akhtar to lead its technology division, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 贸易不确定性再起，中国股市在香港下跌
item.description: 在美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）表示全球最大的两个经济体之间的贸易谈判 "有点停滞不前 "之后，中国股市周五在香港下跌。【原文：Chinese stocks fell in Hong Kong on Friday, after US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said trade talks between the world’s two largest economies are “a bit stalled.”】

item.title: 马斯克与电报公司的人工智能协议为更多戏剧性事件埋下伏笔
item.description:
通过与人工智能聊天机器人 Grok 的深度整合，帕维尔-杜罗夫（Pavel Durov）的自由应用程序上的阴谋论和极端主义可能会得到进一步发展。【原文：

Conspiracy theories and extremism on Pavel Durov’s freewheeling app could be supercharged by a deep integration with AI chatbot Grok.  

】

item.title: 中国对冲基金买入四月跌势 将十年涨幅扩大至 1,485
item.description: 一家中国对冲基金在 4 月份美国新关税导致中国股市暴跌时买入，今年以来该基金的回报率已跃升 20%，自十年前成立以来的总回报率达到 1485%。【原文：A Chinese hedge fund that bought the dip in April when the nation’s stocks plunged on fresh US tariffs has jumped 20% this year, extending its total return since inception a decade ago to 1,485%.】

item.title: 经济学家警告欧洲央行避免延迟最后两次降息
item.description: 彭博社的一项调查显示，欧洲央行将再降息两次，但受访者警告说，两次降息之间不应间隔太久，否则投资者会认为欧洲央行的宽松政策已经结束。【原文：The European Central Bank will lower interest rates twice more, according to a Bloomberg survey, but respondents warned it shouldn’t wait too long between those moves or investors will conclude that its easing campaign is already over.】

item.title: 欧拉电动车大幅下跌，销售额下降导致亏损增加一倍多
item.description: 由于销售额下降，Ola Electric Mobility Ltd. 公布的季度亏损比一年前增加了一倍多，创下一个多月以来的最大跌幅。【原文：Ola Electric Mobility Ltd. declined the most in more than a month, after reporting quarterly losses that more than doubled from a year ago as sales dropped.】

item.title: 丝绸协会称新西兰央行需要更多时间决定现金利率路径
item.description: 新西兰储备银行行长助理凯伦-希尔克（Karen Silk）表示，新西兰储备银行需要更多时间来评估全球贸易动荡对本地经济的影响，然后才能决定官方现金利率的适当路径。【原文：The Reserve Bank of New Zealand needs more time to assess the impact of global trade turmoil on the local economy before deciding on the appropriate path for the Official Cash Rate, Assistant Governor Karen Silk said.】

item.title: 镍业巨头青山削减印尼不锈钢产量
item.description: 由于需求低迷和贸易不确定性对市场造成压力，全球最大的不锈钢制造商暂停了在印度尼西亚的部分生产线，以支撑价格。【原文：The world’s biggest maker of stainless steel has suspended some production lines in Indonesia, in a bid to support prices as sluggish demand and trade uncertainty weigh on the market.】
